The '''Flying Thunder God: Guiding Thunder''' is a {{translation|space-time barrier|時空間結界|jikūkan kekkai|}} technique.

== Usage ==
This barrier technique incorporates the use of the [[Flying Thunder God]] formula to erect a barrier space capable of warping away anything that comes into contact with it. The subject of the technique is then directed to another location marked by the user’s formula.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 502, page 8</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 631, page 1</ref> The barrier has proven to be powerful enough to warp away techniques as destructive as a [[Tailed Beast Ball]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 502, pages 7-8</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 630, pages 15-16</ref>

== Trivia ==
* The last hand seal that Minato makes when he uses this technique resembles one of the [[Wikipedia:Kuji-in#Mantra and mudra|Kuji-in Mudras]]: {{translation|'''Zai'''|在|}} mantra.
